@graph.name: Thank You - OptizenApp Registration Complete
@graph.description: Registration confirmation page for OptizenApp users

@graph.name: Registration Confirmation
@graph.description: User registration successfully completed for OptizenApp

result.name: Account Created
result.description: User account successfully created and confirmation email sent

@graph.name: Next Steps After Registration
@graph.description: What to do after completing OptizenApp registration

step.name: Check Email Inbox
step.text: Look for confirmation email from OptizenApp in your primary inbox

step.name: Check Spam Folder
step.text: If email not received, check spam or junk folder for confirmation message

step.name: Activate Account
step.text: Click activation link in confirmation email to complete setup

mainEntity.name: What if I don't receive the confirmation email?

acceptedAnswer.text: Check your spam or junk folder first. If still not found, contact support for assistance with account activation.

mainEntity.name: How long does it take to receive the confirmation email?

acceptedAnswer.text: Confirmation emails are typically sent within a few minutes of registration completion.

mainEntity.name: Can I start using OptizenApp before confirming my email?

acceptedAnswer.text: Email confirmation is required to activate your account and access OptizenApp features.

@graph.name: Email Delivery Troubleshooting
@graph.description: Common solutions for email delivery issues

itemListElement.name: Check Spam Folder
itemListElement.description: Automated emails may be filtered to spam or junk folders

itemListElement.name: Verify Email Address
itemListElement.description: Ensure the email address provided during registration is correct

itemListElement.name: Wait 10-15 Minutes
itemListElement.description: Email delivery may be delayed due to server processing

itemListElement.name: Contact Support
itemListElement.description: Reach out to customer support if email is not received after troubleshooting
